caption: Tanuki: 'Hikoichi, tell me what is the thing you fear the most?'
Hikoichi: 'ManjÅ« (steamed buns) is my greatest fear. Please, don't tell anyone about this.'
Tanuki: 'You're so dead!' *shapeshifts into human and went to town*
Hikoichi: 'Oh no! It's steamed buns! My greatest fear.' *nom nom nom*
The tanuki, realizing he's fooled, throw rocks into Hikoichi's rice fields. Hikoichi: 'I'm so glad the tanuki throw rocks instead of horse dung, that would've destroyed my crops.'
The next day, Hikoichi wake up with horse dung all over his rice fields. With the horse dung as fertilizers, Hikoichi had a good harvest that year.
